code: export var trimLink=function trimLink(link,charLimit){return link.length<charLimit?link:link.slice(0,charLimit).concat('...');};export var prettifyLink=function prettifyLink(link){return link.startsWith('http')?link.split('//')[1]:link;};export var fixUrl=function fixUrl(link){return link.startsWith('http')?link:'https://'.concat(link);};
